########
Examples
########

The following scripts are found in the `\examples` folder. They provide
examples for how to use :mod:`imggen`.


build_doc_images.py
===================
The `build_doc_images.py` script creates the images used in the
documentation for :mod:`imggen`. More information is available
from the help::

    python3 build_doc_images -h


noisy.py
========
The `noisy.py` script provides a command line interface for generating
images of pseudorandom noise with :mod:`imggen`. More information is
available from the help::

    python3 noisy.py
